channel.title: I need some help with changing color and bonuses of weapons
channel.description: Okay im using Whip Lash source and xscape client and I was wondering how I would go about making a dragon whip, like a red whip, or how would i make like a black phat with +20 str. Im a lil new to this whole coding thing and ive been reading around so just throw me some tips or just tell me, either way heh. thanks

item.title: I need some help with changing color and bonuses of weapons
item.dc:creator: @dank_k0 dank k0
item.description:
@dank_k0 wrote:

if there is i cant find it :x[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2009, 01:34:42 pm[/size][hr]anyone know?

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help with changing color and bonuses of weapons

item.title: I need some help with changing color and bonuses of weapons
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Changing the color of an item is client side. Then you have to declare it and give it the bonus which is server side. There is some tutorials on google on how to do this.

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help with changing color and bonuses of weapons
